description: ðŸŽ‰ Get ready for an intellectual adventure with Boltzmann Brains 6.0, the quiz night of the year!..

title: Poster Competition
description: Get ready to celebrate the 5th anniversary of The Physics Society of IISER..

title: Peer Discussion
description: Hosted by Arijit Das, a PhD student. An overview of the Standard Model of Particle Physics.

title: Movie Screening
description: PSIT will be starting our monthly screenings -we will be kicking off with an all time classic, "2001: A Space Odyssey".

title: Peer Discussion
description: Hosted by Gouree and Eswar (B20). Friedmann equations, a set of equations that governs the universe expansion.

title: Peer Discussion
description: Hosted by Kartik Bhide(B17). We will look at the discovery of the Higgs Boson, from theory to experiment and beyond.

title: Peer Discussion
description: Hosted by Shubham Das (B19). Basic concepts and fundamentals of quantum information theory.

title: Hubble Tension and the mystery of the Expanding Universe
description: We will primarily focus on Hubble tension and some mysteries behind an expanding universe.

title: Peer Discussion
description: Hosted by Aadi(B19). We will focus on the particle in a box problem, applications and insights on the same.

title: Foundation Week 2022
description: The Foundation Week 2022 was celebrated to mark the second anniversary of the Physics Society, IISER Thiruvananthapuram, from 23 to 31 January 2022.

title: PSI(T) Short Activity Report 2020-21
description: The Physics Society of IISER Thiruvananthapuram - PSI(T) has been an open organization under the guidance of the School of Physics with the primary objective of promoting Physics among students across all levels.
